REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f2925 reute u f BC-N.Z.-FOREIGN-RESERVES 03-26 0052

TEXT.TITLE: N.Z. FOREIGN RESERVES FALL SLIGHTLY IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: New Zealand's official foreign reserves fell slightly to 7.13 billion N.Z. Dlrs in February from 7.15 billion in January but were sharply above 2.85 billion in February 1986, the Reserve Bank said in its weekly statistical release. REUTER
